response.overview: In a quiet stater suspended between dream and ritual, a man wakes to find his friend bound to a chair, a weapon at his feet, and a message that reads: “ذل من لا سيف له” — Humiliated is the one without a sword. What follows is a surreal cycle of fear, power and repetition.  The roles soon invert. Another man wakes the same way. Another letter. Another weapon. The cycle resets, mirroring the endless loop of dominance and fragility between people who share trust yet test it.
response.tagline: Humiliated is the one without a sword
response.title: ذل من لا سيف له
